attributes.action: Introduce compulsary Driving test to include Eyesight & full Medical for over 70's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As we get older our health, eyesight & judgement diminish to the detrement of safe driving. At present as a driver approaches the 70th birthday all that is required is a declaration that their health has not deteriated. I propose that all drivers should undergo a full eyesights check, which if passed successfully would be followed by a full medical. Then if this was successful a driving test to be carried out by the applicant. This process would ensure that drivers were fit to drive and could drive in current traffic conditions to a safe standard.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
